#  Graphic symbol – downloadable files -- AGH UST 

URL: https://agh.edu.pl/en/o-agh/multimedia/znak-graficzny-agh/znak-graficzny-bez-nazwy
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:19:36

Skip to content ↓

 Graphic symbol – downloadable files 

The AGH UST graphic symbol has three primary versions: multi-coloured and two monochromatic ones – positive and negative.

In the multi-coloured version, the university colours are: green, black, and red. Reproducing this version of the symbol in the Pantone colour scheme (“pms” in the file name) guarantees a coherent copy of the symbol’s colours, regardless of the place where the materials were printed.

Monochromatic versions of the symbol are to be used when reproducing the symbol on backgrounds other than white or light grey. Monochromatic versions are also used when the printing method requires limiting the number of colours. An example of such an instance would be reproducing the symbol entirely in black in black-and-white press advertisements or faxed documents.
